content: Loved this line ❤ Hilarious as always. I have an addition for you — When you ask him to help you open a too-tight-jar, he does it and then flexes his muscles at you; and invites you to touch and see how strong he is. Or if at the slightest excuse, he shows off his ‘muscles’. On a side note, I’ve actually had one guy tell me — with a straight face — that he wanted to join the military because he wanted to be macho. I am very proud that I didn’t laugh at him, well, not right away.
